th.name: patient_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each patient in DataWarehouse

th.name: store_num
th.desc: Identifies the store where the questionnaire information was collected

th.name: program_name
th.desc: Name of the CPS program that triggered this questionnaire

th.name: message_key
th.desc: Unique identifier key for this particular message, in the message fact table

th.name: message_num
th.desc: Unique identifier key for this particular message, in the message fact table

th.name: ques_key
th.desc: A unique key assigned to each Questionnaire

th.name: ques_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each Questionnaire
